snippet: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Tuesday that the central bank is taking policy steps to prevent unwanted gains in long-term rates....

headline.print_headline: BOJ's Kuroda-Taking Steps to Prevent Unwanted Gains in Long-Term Rates
headline.main: BOJ's Kuroda-Taking Steps to Prevent Unwanted Gains in Long-Term Rates

lead_paragraph: Bank of Japan Governor Haruhiko Kuroda said on Tuesday that the central bank is taking policy steps to prevent unwanted gains in long-term rates.
